scripts.cy:run:report: npm run cy:run && npm run generate:report
scripts.pretest: if exist tests\cypress\reports rmdir /s /q tests\cypress\reports && mkdir tests\cypress\reports
scripts.generate:report: mochawesome-merge tests/cypress/reports/*.json > tests/cypress/reports/report.json && marge tests/cypress/reports/report.json --reportDir tests/cypress/reports --inline

name: demo-app-cypress-automation
description: Testing di repository ini dilakukan di 2 level yaitu :
